text: The 1987 Omloop Het Volk was the 42nd edition of the Omloop Het Volk cycle race and was held on 28 February 1987. The race started and finished in Sint-Amandsberg. 198 riders started the race, only 63 finished. The race was won by Teun van Vliet. ==Complete Results== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Result ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Team ! scope="col" | Time
